QAData.question: Who won between Southampton and Crystal Palace on Sat, 30 Apr 2022 14:00:00 GMT?
QAData.answer: Crystal Palace won 2–1 over Southampton on Sat, 30 Apr 2022 14:00:00 GMT.

funFacts.fallback: Jordan Ayew lost the most duels (20) in the match.
Nathan Redmond has the least touches (34) of any outfield player.
Oriol Romeu was Player of the Match with a rating of 8.6.
Oriol Romeu created the most chances (4) in the match.
Kyle Walker-Peters won the most duels (11) in the match.
Marc Guehi completed the most passes (70) in the match.
Marc Guehi is the most fouled player in the match (4 times).
Marc Guehi is the most accurate passer (92%) in the match.
